entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Richmond Hill
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:20 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Snow mixed with rain late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 10:29 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 10:29 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
